original_text:
The kings of the earth set themselves,
    and the rulers take counsel together,
    against the Lord and against his Anointed, saying,
korean_text: 세상의 군왕들이 나서며 관원들이 서로 꾀하여 여호와와 그의 기름 부음 받은 자를 대적하며

sentences.original_text: The kings of the earth set themselves
and the rulers take counsel together
against the Lord and against his Anointed
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와와 그의 기름 부음 받은 자를 대적하여
